protection-indicator-desc: An extension created solely for the purpose of adding protection indicators to pages.
protection-indicator-explanation-cascadi: This page is cascading $2 protected until $3. The '$1' is right are required to $2 this page.
This page is cascading $2 protected. The '$1' right is required to $2 this page.
protection-indicator-explanation-non-cas: This page is $2 protected until $3. The '$1' right is required to $2 this page.
This page is $2 protected. The '$1' right is required to $2 this page.
protection-indicator-reason-wrapper: User [[User:$1|$1]] provided the following reason for protecting the page : $2.
